title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: Save the Dates: Digman! Season 2, Minecraft on Max and More
description: Rip Digman isn’t done digging yet. Andy Samberg’s animated comedy Digman! will return for Season 2 on Wednesday, July 9 at 10:30/9:30c on Comedy Central, following an all-new South Park, the network announced on Monday. Samberg stars as archaeologist Rip Digman, who embarks on Indiana Jones-style adventures with his student Saltine, voiced by Mitra Jouhari […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: Amazon Is Offering Audible for Just 99¢/Month — Here’s How to Claim the Offer
description: Amazon is once again offering a stellar deal: New users can get Audible for just 99¢/month for three months. Here’s how to claim the Audible offer, to unlock all the audiobooks we love from The Summer I Turned Pretty, Interior Chinatown, Lessons in Chemistry, Big Little Lies and Bosch to the Audible original Slayers: A […]
author: How to Stream Team
